title: Sony is reportedly working on an animated Ghostbusters movie
text:
Sony is reportedly working on an animated Ghostbusters movie 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
The universe of the Ghostbusters franchise might be getting a little bigger with the addition of an animated movie that Sony Pictures is rep...
